AI Description: xprop is a utility for retrieving the properties of a window in a X server system. It allows users to query and display properties of a given X server window, which can be useful for debugging and troubleshooting GUI-related issues.
Core Features: Retrieves Properties Of X Server Windows, Queries & Displays Window Properties, Useful For Debugging & Troubleshooting Gui-Related Problems
General Tags: X Server, Window Properties, Gui Debugging
